items.title: Message title
items.content: It's probably too long to fit on a single line so it will need to be truncated in the preview window

items.title: Hey there, how are you?
items.content: Hello neighbour, we found your lost cat in our backyard

items.title: Good Morning, want some coffee?
items.content: I don't want to write a huge paragraph, but I'm going to get coffee

items.title: Up for a game of football?
items.content: Hey Gronk, I'm gonna be at the park today, want to get some reps?
